document_data.caption: Map showing the location of Gauntyl Villa (81).
document_data.name: Gauntyl Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Gauntyl Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Gauntyl]].
document_data.Location: The Gauntyl Villa was situated along [[Ivory Street]], across from [[Eltorchul Villa]] and next to the [[Temple of Beauty]], in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Structure: This building complex consisted of two high quality buildings, one that was two stories tall and another that stood a single story tall,Evidence of this information can be seen in how the villa is depicted on maps.
